all I remember about the stroke is the fact I woke up one morning with a splitting headache
and it was so bad that uh
I think it's probably the worst headache I ever had
um took a couple aspirin and went to  uh outside and picked up the mail  my  not the mail but  my newspaper
went back to have breakfast

the blocks of words ch were just that
they were blocks
and some of it  they weren't s all together
it was like I was seeing part of the words or part of the blocks of words not the whole words
so  I left the newspaper that morning and didn't uh read it and finished getting ready and went to work
and uh drove to work

I couldn't see all the words all that
but I was able to drive properly
and uh drove to work
got to work
and when I tried to  got to work I tried to log into my computer

I think that's probably the best thing I can say about that
I didn't know how to log in
I didn't know my username
I didn't know my password
anything
and I just had a total blank with that
so  uh I worked at it for a while and couldn't  couldn't do anything
so  I finally went to my boss and said
hey I've got a problem
I've got a headache
and uh I just can't  can't log in
and uh I was asked
just take time
and find a place to rest and relax
and come back in a_little while and try again

and I couldn't make it
so  I finally said
I  I can't uh do it
I need to go home
so  I went home and went to bed
uh when I got home I took a couple more aspirin and went to bed and spent most of the day in bed
and I  I slept
and then when I got up in the afternoon I was able to uh read
I was able to see a little bit more with the newspaper where I could read a little bit of that

and um I do Sudokus the puzzle

got up the next day and went to uh exercise class with a group that we meet at  early in the mornings on Monday Wednesday and Friday
and this was a Friday morning that
I'd gone to work on Thursday
couldn't work
so  then Friday when I got up I went exercise with the group
and with the group uh we normally start out slow and do a few small exercises and then walk a little bit and warm up
and while we're walking we talk and visit with each_other

uh the words were correct
but they were not making sense as complete words
so  I said  knew there was something wrong
my friends knew there was something wrong

we spent an hour exercising together
I went home and uh had breakfast
and uh I told FirstnameP
I said
there's something wrong

uh my heart was beating too fast and out_of rhythm
and so they spent most of the time from the next two or three days correcting that issue
